pages.text: Listracanthus is a chondrichthyan with uncertain affinities and it is primarily known from their many dentricles that line the top of its body. It has a long, slender, snake like body and a whip like tail and it was an active hunter.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw/Cooked Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Block Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
